schema.label: Example span colours

fieldGroup.description: Unique Class, Rebecca Purple (Set in root styles)

Work activities routine and predicable.Member of a work group assisting others in delivery of objectives.
Key words: assists, acknowledges, seeks, shows, applies

Varied work activities performed in a range of contexts. Some individual responsibility. Limited guidance needed. Results reviewed for quality. Contributes to delivering team or functional objectives.
Key words: contributes, identifies, anticipates, delivers, shares, recognises

Broad range of work in a complex and non-routine context. Significant personal autonomy and team authority. Coordinates and manages work to deliver successful outcomes.
Key words: manages, encourages, challenges, develops, adapts

Complex technical or professional activities in a wide variety of contexts. High confidence in results. Works across the organisation to deliver on operational and strategic objectives. Able to identify capability of others in this activity and is recognised as an authority by company and/or industry peers.
Key words: champions, inspires, motivates, enables, shapes
